page.title: 16MY LEISURE TIME_SKELMERSDALE
page.content:
My name is Kerry Wilson and I am 10 years of age.This is a diary of a typical week in my life:
MONDAY-After school I have a 20 minute private Dancing Lesson.After tea I go with a friend for Drama Practice.When I return home at 8p.m.I will watch T.V.for an hour or so before going to bed. TUESDAY-This is my Swimming Lesson day.I can swim a little but I want to improve.After the lesson,at the town centre pool,I often buy some chips for my tea.I am then allowed to play out until it is time for bed. WEDNESDAY-I have a piano lesson after school.Then I have a quick tea because it is also Brownies night.I enjoy Brownies but I will soon be leaving. I then watch some T.V.before having supper and going to bed.
